amendment.description: Amendment added language defining an "eligible low-income country" as one in which its government shall have been chosen by, and permits, free elections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-586 to add a provision to Section 1626, defining an `eligible low-income country' to include that the government shall have been chosen by, and permits, free elections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 382 - 41, 2 Present (Roll no. 197).
